# busybox

<!---
Note: Do NOT edit directly, this file was generated using https://github.com/chainguard-images/readme-generator
-->

[![CI status](https://github.com/chainguard-images/busybox/actions/workflows/release.yaml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/chainguard-images/busybox/actions/workflows/release.yaml)

Container image with only busybox and libc (available in both musl and glibc variants). Suitable for running any binaries that only have a dependency on glibc/musl.

## Get It!

The image is available on `cgr.dev`:

```
docker pull cgr.dev/chainguard/busybox:latest
```

## Supported tags

| Tag | Digest | Arch |
| --- | ------ | ---- |
| `1.35.0-r25` `latest` | `sha256:4dfaffda0b3b61d9f27e3209fbb4ed8ca5a0cc838aaada05ecc032aef59aec7b`<br/>[View entry in Rekor](https://rekor.tlog.dev/?hash=sha256:4dfaffda0b3b61d9f27e3209fbb4ed8ca5a0cc838aaada05ecc032aef59aec7b) | `386` `amd64` `arm64` `armv6` `armv7` `ppc64le` `riscv64` `s390x` |
| `1.35.0-r2-glibc` | `sha256:bd9a46d624ccd2a0c3aecad95dfab5ad693fee069a32599822d627ddec9c0428`<br/>[View entry in Rekor](https://rekor.tlog.dev/?hash=sha256:bd9a46d624ccd2a0c3aecad95dfab5ad693fee069a32599822d627ddec9c0428) | `amd64` |



## Signing

All Chainguard Images are signed using [Sigstore](https://sigstore.dev)!

<details>
<br/>
To verify the image, download <a href="https://github.com/sigstore/cosign">cosign</a> and run:

```
COSIGN_EXPERIMENTAL=1 cosign verify cgr.dev/chainguard/busybox:latest | jq
```

## Build

This image is built with [apko](https://github.com/chainguard-dev/apko).
